title: E3 Dead, Summer Game Fest Lives! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 04.01.22
description:
I, for one, welcome our new overlord Geoff Keighley!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:12:00 - Housekeeping
ARE. YOU. READY?! It’s April, which means it’s a new Platinum item for Patreon, and this month it’s the KFW Kinda Funny wrestling shirt: https://twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids/status/1509915992792584198
PSILY
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: FargoBrady, Pranksy, & Anonymous
The Roper Report  -
00:15:15 - E3 2022 Canceled, REB @ IGN
00:18:13 - Summer Game Fest LIVES!
00:19:45 - Do you see E3 returning when it can be an in person event, hopefully next year? - Best Friends Q:BJ Bernardo
00:46:20 - Ad
00:48:30 - ‘Halo Infinite’ to feature content from the TV series, Gene Park @ WaPo
00:52:05 - Senators Weigh in on Xbox/Activision/Blizzard, Ryan Leston @ IGN
00:57:19 - Capcom is raising its employees’ base salaries by 30% in Japan, Tom Ivan @ VGC
00:57:55 - The Division 2’s New Mode and Shitty Timing, Paul Tassi @ Forbes
01:00:40 - Out today
01:03:02 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Blessing and Tim
